Uses of Interface
org.opengis.referencing.crs.CRSAuthorityFactory

Packages that use CRSAuthorityFactory
Package
Description
org.apache.sis.gui.referencing
Widgets about coordinate reference systems.
org.apache.sis.referencing
Base classes for reference systems used for general positioning.
org.apache.sis.referencing.factory
Creates Coordinate Reference System (CRS) objects from given properties or authority codes.
org.apache.sis.referencing.factory.sql
Factories for geodetic objects defined in a SQL database, typically the EPSG dataset.
